description:
It's the story of a young fighter with big ambition. Johnny Torque had dreams of glory and visions of someday reaching the top. He knew he was like a lump of amorphous clay. He knew what he needed was direction and guidance from someone who knew the ins and outs and the politics. That's why he went to Trystan Bull...the legend.

And you may know this boxing story by now; a bit of talent mixed with a monumental hunger for success, combined with unwavering dedication. Throw in some wisdom from an incredibly hot mentor with a long hard cock. Stick that cock in determined, young Johnny's eager mouth and watch the wise, experienced Coach Trystan fuck his face with passion. And all these stories end the same way - in a burst of glorious triumph! This time, all over Johnny's chest.

Enjoy!
title: Raging Boner
